attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Phil Neal was Bob Paisleys first signing for Liverpool football club in 1974.
Phil Neal has WON 7 1st division titles (premiership) 4 Champions league medals, 4  league cup medals, 1 eufa cup medal.  was one of englands best defenders.  What more does the man have to do to get reckognised. apart from all his medals, he does so much for charity as well. other players who havent achieved as much get more recognition.

you know it makes sence. we want to see Phil Neal KNIGHTED!!!!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
